body.name: Convenience Concepts Maxwell Mid Century End Table, Espresso
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 56 mins
body.description: The bold design of the Maxwell End Table will bring new life to any space. Featuring a multi tier table top surface this piece will have plenty of space for anything from remotes and lamps to books and your favorite thirst quencher. In mid century styling and available in multiple finishes this piece will easily complement any decor. Look for other pieces from the Savannah Collection to complete the look sold separately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The styles you love at prices you'll love more More style and more choices We make thoughtfully designed furniture that's affordable and super-easy to assemble, with dozens of styles inspired by current trends, including traditional, rustic, transitional, modern, urban, and contemporary. With more styles and choices you're sure to find something you love. Thoughtfully designed furniture Our furniture collections include a wide variety of styles and finishes. We research the trends, materials, and finishes that will enhance the style of your home. Each piece is carefully crafted with hardworking materials and durable finishes that will bring years of enjoyment. Unique discoveries and treasures Convenience Concepts is an excellent resource for unique items that make great conversation pieces, whether it's a hall table to greet guests, a comfy storage ottoman, a handsome TV stand, or a sparkling mirrored cabinet. We make it easy to turn an ordinary space into something special.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of the same end tables to go next to a new couch. We were going for the mid-century modern look and I think these tables fit nicely. They are good quality, nice wood espresso tone, packaging was well done and protected all pieces (I wish no stryrofoam was used but it was packaged very well). The tables are incredibly easy to put together (wooden dowels and two screws per leg using an allen wrench included in the packaging). The screws fit easily since the threading in the legs were already completed. Though I agree with other reviews, you will either need a mallet or a strong person to push hard. I did one table with a mallet and then my husband was able to push the other one together just using force. I would score this a 9/10 for ease of putting together with only one point off for needing the mallet - the first table took maybe 15-20 minutes to put together and the second one 10-15. I would buy these again and I would recommend them to someone looking for a mid-century modern look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect MidCentury End Table
reviews.reviewText: I love this table. Sturdy, easy to put together, nice dark stain. Quintessential mid century modern piece. It’s not a large end table, perfect for small spaces. But enough room for a decorative piece and a cup or two of coffee. Not big enough for a lamp without it looking overwhelming. I put a standing lamp next to the table.My husband put it together in less than 10 minutes. No tools needed. Allen wrench provided.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice look, nice price, good customer service
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice looking table at a very attractive price. I have been looking for a table in this style for some time, and this was the first one I've found that fits exactly. For the low price, I wasn't expecting anything particularly sturdy or long lasting.I was able to assemble it solo without major difficulty... except that the top surface piece I received was faulty. It would not snap to the built-in connectors on the support piece. And, in fact, those connectors ended up pushing up through the surface of the table and damaging it, even though I was following the assembly instructions.I reached out to customer support via email on a weekend, and received a response the same day to send a replacement table top. It arrived about 10 days later, and this one attached properly and easily. I am very satisfied with my completed table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All wood. No cheap partical board. Got a lot of good comments about the look. Very mid century modern looking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These tables are the perfect mid century piece
reviews.reviewText: These tables are the perfect mid century piece! The quality is great and they feel solid. Only one thing I didnt care too much for was the "pop-in-place" way the top shelf fits on the base. It was a bit hap hazard and I would have preferred a locking nut. This furniture feels and looks high end for sure. One of the tables arrived with a good size scratch on the top and a chip out of the veneer, but it wasnt enough for me to make a fuss about, as the condition was listed as "like-new". I am totally happy with it, and the shade of stain matches the picture shown.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice vintage inspired table
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a vintage inspired two-tiered end table for a while. This one fits the bill. It’s cute and fits perfectly in my small living room. It was easy enough to put together. All of the parts were there with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Table was easily assembled, and is sturdy. However, the color is not espresso. Perhaps consider changing the name? It’s definitely more maple or mahogany.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Top part wobbly, won’t stay on, now ruined
reviews.reviewText: Instructions said to “press” the shop shelf onto the knobs below. Did that and now there are bubbles on the shelf. Not only can you NOT press the shelf down without ruining it, the shelf isn’t even sturdy. It wobbles itself off. Even tried to hammer it and it won’t work. I’m honestly disappointed in this product. I’ve seen its prices range from $90-120 and its lack of usability is not worth that price.I should also mention that after inspecting it some more, there are several scratches throughout the shelf. It gives me the impression that this must have been a used shelf that was sent to me when I was sure ordered a new one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Modification to the Maxwell end table
reviews.reviewText: In my views of the Maxwell End Table, the centre board holding up the top half shelf should be changed to, two wooden legs/spindles, one on each corner of the front of the half shelf, that way you have better access to all of the bottom main shelf for usage. With the End Table is setting beside your Lazy Boy Chair approx 11 inches by 8 inches is a waste of space on the far side of the centre piece board holding up the top shelf that you can't get access to. With the suggested modification you have access to all of the end table both top and bottom shelves.
